title: Add backend image generation endpoint

requirements.text: Create a backend function in main.mo that accepts a text prompt and returns a structured response containing an imageUrl field with the placeholder URL 'https://placehold.co/1024x1536?text=Backend+OK'

quotes: export async function generateImage(prompt) { return { imageUrl: "https://placehold.co/1024x1536?text=Backend+OK" }; }

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes a public query or update function named generateImage that accepts a Text parameter
Function returns a record type with an imageUrl field containing the exact URL: https://placehold.co/1024x1536?text=Backend+OK
Function can be called from the frontend with a prompt string

requirements.text: Create a frontend interface that allows users to input a text prompt, call the backend generateImage function, and display the returned image URL
acceptanceCriteria: UI includes a text input field for entering prompts
UI includes a button to trigger image generation
Generated image URL is displayed as an actual image on the page
Uses React Query for backend communication

requirements.text: Apply a creative and cohesive visual design theme to the application with a distinct style using harmonious colors (avoid blue and purple), readable typography, and clean layout patterns that enhance the image generation experience
acceptanceCriteria: Consistent color palette applied throughout the UI
Typography choices support readability and visual hierarchy
Layout provides clear visual flow for the prompt-to-image workflow

constraints: Backend must use Motoko, not JavaScript
All backend logic must reside in the single main actor (backend/main.mo)
Frontend must use React with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and React Query
nonGoals: Actual AI image generation (using placeholder URL only)
